tool.name: BlastN TSV to gapped GFF3

param.label: Maximum gap size before generating a new match_part
param.name: min_gap

tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
This tool probably has MANY BlastN specific assumptions hardcoded inside. Please do not use on BlastP data. Additionally this tool was written hastily for BICH464 at the end of the year. It MUST be re-built before real use. Contact Eric if you need to use it.
**What it does**
Convert BlastN TSV results into GFF3 format.
